JobFullDesc: Microsoft is on a mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset, inspiring excellence, and encouraging teams and leaders to be their best each day. In doing so, we create life-changing innovations that impact billions of lives around the world. You can help us achieve our mission. The HR Business Insights (HRBI) team drives data-based decisions to tackle strategic challenges and opportunities at Microsoft. We partner with HR Leaders and Business Leaders to help shape the workforce of the future. Our team advises HR through data-based insights and compelling storytelling to achieve business objectives and people priorities, enables deep insights for the HR partners supporting key people and organization decisions and initiatives, and partners to grow data capability and enable modern data solutions that increase HR’s impact through leveraging data. The ideal candidate is comfortable in a fast-paced environment and capable of juggling multiple initiatives simultaneously often with short time constraints. They can flex and reprioritize to adjust to changing business conditions. They have a background working with or supporting BI tools, primarily data models, and are comfortable communicating with individuals with technical backgrounds including engineering project managers, software engineers and solution architects. They have experience with vendor management and leading geographically dispersed project teams.ResponsibilitiesResponsibilitiesDevelop a deep understanding of HR business and their needs for decision making tools using data and insightsLead stakeholders and project partners through the reporting solution development cycle focusing on improving scalability, performance, and the end-user experience.Translate business needs into technical requirements for data models with a succinct distinction between what, why and how. Focus on scalable design, performance, security and story telling. Partner with co-workers and our engineering counterparts in planning, prioritization and execution of reporting solutionsAdopt a strong data-driven approach by defining the metrics for measuring the success of the project, develop and present the metrics quarterly to the leadership team.Manage our data and reporting roadmap, looking ahead to determine upcoming needs and partner with engineering to develop a plan that would assist in meeting those needs. Lead projects ranging from ad-hoc business analysis to driving infrastructure requirements to enable proper data collection, manipulation, and reporting. Break through communication issues and effectively develop relationships with stakeholders at all levels of the organization. CompetenciesAdaptability: regularly scan the environment to help anticipate changes that could affect key projects and effectively change plans.
